summary: Mix warm milk, melted margarine, flour, sugar, yeast, salt, egg, and water into dough; knead and let rest.Roll out dough, spread cinnamon-sugar filling with raisins, roll up, slice, and place in muffin tin, bake at 375°F for 20 minutes, then cool and serve warm.
Butter bread, add garlic powder, Parmesan, and mozzarella.Broil until golden, then top with parsley.

Soak kidney beans overnight, then drain and rinse.Sauté spices and onion-ginger-garlic paste in oil, add tomatoes and cook until soft.Pressure cook beans with water and seasonings until tender, then stir in garam masala and garnish with cilantro.

Mix tomato paste, onion, garlic, water, and olive oil in a baking dish as the base.Layer sliced vegetables in a spiral pattern; drizzle with olive oil, season, and sprinkle with thyme.Cover with parchment and bake at 375°F for 45 minutes until tender
Mix yeast, sugar, warm water; let sit 10 min.Add flour, salt, yogurt, ghee; knead and rise 1.5 hrs.Shape, brush ghee, sprinkle kalonji, broil 2 min each side
Blend thawed strawberries, amaretto, vanilla ice cream, extract, vodka, and ice until smooth. Pour into a glass and top with whipped cream and a strawberry.
Boil carrots briefly, add peas, and drain. Stir-fry with garlic in hot oil, scramble in eggs, then add cooked rice. Toss with soy sauce and sesame oil.
